thread.title: M20 remains closed after accident
thread.title_full: M20 remains closed after accident | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: M20 remains closed after accident
text:
The coastbound M20 in Kent is still closed between junction 8 near Maidstone and junction 9 near Ashford following an earlier road traffic collision.
The closure is likely to be in place for most of the day while Kent Police investigate the incident.
A clearly signed diversion is in place via the A20. Road users travelling to the Port of Dover may exit the M20 at junction 7 and follow the A249, M2 and A2.
Drivers planning to use this section of the M20 are advised to plan their journeys and allow extra time to reach their destinations.
Last updated Thu 15 Oct 2015 Travel Kent
